item.title: Missing curved mirror, 14th January
item.description:
There is a missing curved mirror opposite the exit from the James Hopkins Trust. This causes he exit to be dangerous for vehicles to leave due to a blind spot where vehicles on the main road cannot be seen by vehicles leaving. This is likely to cause a collision.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Upton Lane, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Controlled crossing point changing too quickly, 14th January
item.description:
The crossing point in Hubble Road changes at the same time a pedestrian presses it. The problem being that this is now causing traffic to back up on to the A40 at peak times as so many single pedestrians cross one after the other each pressing the crossing button. A delay needs to be added to the Crossing Point to "collect" pedestrians in groups and to allow a greater free flow of traffic (even if this is just adjusted at peak times).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hubble Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep craters, 14th January
